dkeep.logic

Interface GameLogic

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Dungeon, Keep

    public interface GameLogic
    Abstraction that allows for the game's class to save the levels without knowing the specifics of each one. It only contains the methods that needed in the game

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Hero get_hero() 
      Map get_map() 
      GameState get_status() 
      void move(char key)
      Moves the characters of the game, by calling move_person

    • Method Detail

      • get_hero

        Hero get_hero()
        Returns:
        The hero of this game

      • get_map

        Map get_map()
        Returns:
        The map of this game

      • move

        void move(char key)
        Moves the characters of the game, by calling move_person
        Parameters:
        key - Key that expresses the hero movement: a, 1 to left; d, 1 to the right; w, 1 upwards; s, 1 downwards

        GameState get_status()
